movie.title: Crocodile Dundee
movie.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
movie.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

movie.title: Ratatouille
movie.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
movie.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movie.title: City of God
movie.actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
movie.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

movie.title: Stardust
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly
movie.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

movie.title: Apocalypto
movie.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead
movie.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

movie.title: No Country for Old Men
movie.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
movie.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movie.title: The Third Man
movie.actors: Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Orson Welles, Trevor Howard
movie.plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

movie.title: The Beach
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon, Virginie Ledoyen
movie.plot: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

movie.title: Scarface
movie.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
movie.plot: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movie.title: Sid and Nancy
movie.actors: Gary Oldman, Chloe Webb, David Hayman, Debby Bishop
movie.plot: Morbid biographical story of Sid Vicious, bassist with British punk group the Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen. When the Sex Pistols break up after their fateful US tour, ...

movie.title: Black Swan
movie.actors: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Barbara Hershey
movie.plot: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

movie.title: Inception
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movie.plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movie.title: Chasing Amy
movie.actors: Ethan Suplee, Ben Affleck, Scott Mosier, Jason Lee
movie.plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.

movie.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movie.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
movie.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movie.title: Midnight Express
movie.actors: Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli
movie.plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

movie.title: Pulp Fiction
movie.actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
movie.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movie.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movie.actors: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
movie.plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

movie.title: Lucky Number Slevin
movie.actors: Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman
movie.plot: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

movie.title: Rear Window
movie.actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
movie.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movie.title: Shutter Island
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow
movie.plot: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movie.title: Reservoir Dogs
movie.actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
movie.plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movie.title: Moneyball
movie.actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright
movie.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

movie.title: The Hangover
movie.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha
movie.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

movie.title: The Great Beauty
movie.actors: Toni Servillo, Carlo Verdone, Sabrina Ferilli, Carlo Buccirosso
movie.plot: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

movie.title: Mary and Max
movie.actors: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Barry Humphries, Eric Bana
movie.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

movie.title: Flight
movie.actors: Nadine Velazquez, Denzel Washington, Carter Cabassa, Adam C. Edwards
movie.plot: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

movie.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movie.actors: Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco, Dean R. Brooks, Alonzo Brown
movie.plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movie.title: Requiem for a Dream
movie.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
movie.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movie.title: The Truman Show
movie.actors: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone
movie.plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

movie.title: The Artist
movie.actors: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell
movie.plot: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
movie.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

movie.title: Lost in Translation
movie.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Bill Murray, Akiko Takeshita, Kazuyoshi Minamimagoe
movie.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

movie.title: Match Point
movie.actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Alexander Armstrong, Paul Kaye, Matthew Goode
movie.plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

movie.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movie.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movie.plot: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

movie.title: Despicable Me 2
movie.actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove
movie.plot: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

movie.title: Downfall
movie.actors: Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Corinna Harfouch, Ulrich Matthes
movie.plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movie.title: Madagascar
movie.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movie.plot: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

movie.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
movie.director: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
movie.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movie.plot: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.

movie.title: God Bless America
movie.actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Melinda Page Hamilton, Mackenzie Brooke Smith
movie.plot: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

movie.title: The Social Network
movie.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Rooney Mara, Bryan Barter, Dustin Fitzsimons
movie.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movie.title: American Gangster
movie.actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin
movie.plot: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

movie.title: Catch Me If You Can
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen
movie.plot: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

movie.title: American History X
movie.actors: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
movie.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movie.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movie.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movie.plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

movie.title: Crash
movie.actors: Karina Arroyave, Dato Bakhtadze, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle
movie.plot: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

movie.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movie.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movie.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movie.title: Oldboy
movie.actors: Min-sik Choi, Ji-tae Yu, Hye-jeong Kang, Dae-han Ji
movie.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

movie.title: Chocolat
movie.actors: Alfred Molina, Carrie-Anne Moss, Aurelien Parent Koenig, Antonio Gil
movie.plot: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

movie.title: Casino Royale
movie.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench
movie.plot: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

movie.title: WALL·E
movie.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movie.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movie.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movie.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movie.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
movie.actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
movie.plot: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.

movie.title: I-See-You.Com
movie.actors: Beau Bridges, Rosanna Arquette, Mathew Botuchis, Shiri Appleby
movie.plot: A 17-year-old boy buys mini-cameras and displays the footage online at I-see-you.com. The cash rolls in as the site becomes a major hit. Everyone seems to have fun until it all comes crashing down....

movie.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movie.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movie.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

movie.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movie.actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Joe Pesci
movie.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movie.title: Oblivion
movie.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough
movie.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movie.title: V for Vendetta
movie.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry
movie.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movie.title: Gattaca
movie.actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Gore Vidal, Xander Berkeley
movie.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

movie.title: Silver Linings Playbook
movie.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
movie.plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

movie.title: Alice in Wonderland
movie.actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway
movie.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movie.title: Pacific Rim
movie.actors: Charlie Hunnam, Diego Klattenhoff, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi
movie.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

movie.title: Cloud Atlas
movie.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving
movie.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

movie.title: The Impossible
movie.actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Samuel Joslin
movie.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

movie.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movie.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto, Denis O'Hare
movie.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movie.title: Before Sunrise
movie.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert, Hanno Pöschl
movie.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movie.title: The Rum Diary
movie.actors: Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard
movie.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

movie.title: Calvary
movie.actors: Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen
movie.plot: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

movie.title: Spirited Away
movie.actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô
movie.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movie.title: Indochine
movie.actors: Catherine Deneuve, Vincent Perez, Linh Dan Pham, Jean Yanne
movie.plot: This story is set in 1930, at the time when French colonial rule in Indochina is ending. A widowed French woman who works in the rubber fields, raises a Vietnamese princess as if she was ...

movie.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movie.actors: Michael Keaton, Emma Stone, Kenny Chin, Jamahl Garrison-Lowe
movie.plot: Illustrated upon the progress of his latest Broadway play, a former popular actor's struggle to cope with his current life as a wasted actor is shown.

movie.title: Boyhood
movie.actors: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Elijah Smith, Lorelei Linklater
movie.plot: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
movie.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie.title: Big Nothing
movie.actors: David Schwimmer, Simon Pegg, Alice Eve, Natascha McElhone
movie.plot: A frustrated, unemployed teacher joining forces with a scammer and his girlfriend in a blackmailing scheme.

movie.title: Das Boot
movie.actors: Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann, Hubertus Bengsch
movie.plot: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

movie.title: Shrek 2
movie.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
movie.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews
movie.plot: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

movie.title: Sin City
movie.director: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino
movie.actors: Jessica Alba, Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel, Powers Boothe
movie.plot: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

movie.title: Shrek
movie.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow
movie.plot: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, an ogre agrees to rescue a princess for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

movie.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movie.actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody
movie.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movie.title: Original Sin
movie.actors: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane, Jack Thompson
movie.plot: A woman along with her lover, plan to con a rich man by marrying him and on earning his trust running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she actually begins to fall in love with him.

movie.title: Despicable Me
movie.actors: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews
movie.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

movie.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
movie.plot: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home - and the gold within it - from the dragon Smaug.

movie.title: The Great Gatsby
movie.actors: Lisa Adam, Frank Aldridge, Amitabh Bachchan, Steve Bisley
movie.plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

movie.title: Ice Age
movie.actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic
movie.plot: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movie.actors: Bruce Allpress, Sean Astin, John Bach, Sala Baker
movie.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movie.title: Ex Machina
movie.actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Corey Johnson, Oscar Isaac, Alicia Vikander
movie.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

movie.title: The Theory of Everything
movie.actors: Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior, Sophie Perry
movie.plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

movie.title: Shogun
movie.actors: Richard Chamberlain, Toshirô Mifune, Yôko Shimada, Furankî Sakai
movie.plot: A English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.

movie.title: Spotlight
movie.actors: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Liev Schreiber
movie.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

movie.title: Whiplash
movie.actors: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Paul Reiser, Melissa Benoist
movie.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movie.title: Hotel Rwanda
movie.actors: Xolani Mali, Don Cheadle, Desmond Dube, Hakeem Kae-Kazim
movie.plot: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

movie.title: The Martian
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels
movie.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

movie.title: The Hateful Eight
movie.actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins
movie.plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

movie.title: The Big Short
movie.actors: Ryan Gosling, Rudy Eisenzopf, Casey Groves, Charlie Talbert
movie.plot: Four denizens in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.
